mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IRSUSER.IRB_BSC A INNER JOIN IRSUSER.IRB_DTL B ON A.BIZ_MNG_NO = B.BIZ_MNG_NO AND A.PRCS_DGR = B.BIZ_DGR WHERE 1=1
AND ( B.BIZ_ORGT_NM LIKE '%' || IRSUSER.FN_TRANSFORM_SPECIAL_CHARS(#{srhBizNm}) || '%' OR B.BIZ_KRN_NM LIKE '%' || IRSUSER.FN_TRANSFORM_SPECIAL_CHARS(#{srhBizNm}) || '%' )
AND B.BIZ_TYPE_CD = #{srhBizTypeCd}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT BIZ_MNG_NO FROM IRSUSER.IRB_EXCR_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = B.BIZ_MNG_NO AND BIZ_DGR = B.BIZ_DGR AND INST_MGNO = #{auth.sInstMgno} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.BIZ_MNG_NO AS BIZ_MNG_NO ,A.BIZ_DGR AS BIZ_DGR ,A.SN AS SN ,A.INST_MGNO AS HNOV_INST_MGNO ,COALESCE(A.ATCNVR_RDCQTY, 0) AS HNOV_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,'' AS HNOV_BLCK_MGNO ,0 AS HNOV_QTY ,'' AS WPMP_INST_MGNO ,0 AS WPMP_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,'' AS WPMP_BLCK_MGNO ,0 AS WPMP_QTY ,'N' AS CHK ,CASE WHEN A.INST_MGNO = C.INST_MGNO THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MASTER_YN ,B.BZENT_NM ,B.BRNO ,B.RPRSV_NM FROM IRSUSER.IRB_EXCR_DTL A LEFT OUTER JOIN IRSUSER.INST_BSC B ON A.INST_MGNO = B.INST_MGNO INNER JOIN IRSUSER.IRB_DTL C ON A.BIZ_MNG_NO = C.BIZ_MNG_NO AND A.BIZ_DGR = C.BIZ_DGR WHERE 1=1 AND A.BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND A.BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) ORDER BY A.SN ASC

SELECT A.BIZ_MNG_NO AS BIZ_MNG_NO ,A.BIZ_DGR AS BIZ_DGR ,A.SN AS SN ,A.INST_MGNO AS HNOV_INST_MGNO ,COALESCE(A.ATCNVR_RDCQTY, 0) AS HNOV_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,'' AS HNOV_BLCK_MGNO ,0 AS HNOV_QTY ,'' AS WPMP_INST_MGNO ,0 AS WPMP_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,'' AS WPMP_BLCK_MGNO ,0 AS WPMP_QTY ,'Y' AS CHK ,CASE WHEN A.INST_MGNO = C.INST_MGNO THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MASTER_YN ,B.BZENT_NM ,B.BRNO ,B.RPRSV_NM FROM IRSUSER.IRB_EXCR_DTL A INNER JOIN IRSUSER.INST_BSC B ON A.INST_MGNO = B.INST_MGNO INNER JOIN IRSUSER.IRB_DTL C ON A.BIZ_MNG_NO = C.BIZ_MNG_NO AND A.BIZ_DGR = C.BIZ_DGR INNER JOIN IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL D ON C.BIZ_MNG_NO = D.BIZ_MNG_NO AND D.BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) AND A.INST_MGNO = D.HNOV_INST_MGNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND A.BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{scsnBgngDgr} AS NUMERIC) ORDER BY A.SN ASC

SELECT A.BIZ_MNG_NO AS BIZ_MNG_NO ,A.BIZ_DGR AS BIZ_DGR ,A.SN AS SN ,A.HNOV_INST_MGNO ,COALESCE(A.HNOV_ATCNVR_RDCQTY, 0) AS HNOV_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,'' AS HNOV_BLCK_MGNO ,0 AS HNOV_QTY ,A.WPMP_INST_MGNO ,COALESCE(A.WPMP_ATCNVR_RDCQTY, 0) AS WPMP_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,'' AS WPMP_BLCK_MGNO ,0 AS WPMP_QTY ,CASE WHEN A.WPMP_INST_MGNO = #{auth.sInstMgno} AND A.AGRE_YN != 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CHK ,CASE WHEN A.WPMP_INST_MGNO = #{auth.sInstMgno} AND A.AGRE_YN != 'Y' THEN '동의' WHEN A.AGRE_YN = 'Y' THEN '동의' ELSE '-' END AS CHK_NM ,'N' AS MASTER_YN ,B.BZENT_NM ,B.BRNO ,B.RPRSV_NM FROM IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL A INNER JOIN IRSUSER.INST_BSC B ON A.WPMP_INST_MGNO = B.INST_MGNO INNER JOIN IRSUSER.IRB_DTL C ON A.BIZ_MNG_NO = C.BIZ_MNG_NO AND A.BIZ_DGR = C.BIZ_DGR WHERE 1=1 AND A.BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND A.BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) ORDER BY A.SN ASC

SELECT A.BIZ_MNG_NO AS BIZ_MNG_NO ,A.BIZ_DGR AS BIZ_DGR ,A.SN AS SN ,A.HNOV_INST_MGNO ,COALESCE(A.HNOV_ATCNVR_RDCQTY, 0) AS HNOV_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,'' AS HNOV_BLCK_MGNO ,0 AS HNOV_QTY ,A.WPMP_INST_MGNO ,COALESCE(A.WPMP_ATCNVR_RDCQTY, 0) AS WPMP_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,'' AS WPMP_BLCK_MGNO ,0 AS WPMP_QTY ,'N' AS CHK ,CASE WHEN A.WPMP_INST_MGNO = #{auth.sInstMgno} THEN '동의' ELSE '-' END AS CHK_NM ,'N' AS MASTER_YN ,B.BZENT_NM ,B.BRNO ,B.RPRSV_NM FROM IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL A LEFT OUTER JOIN IRSUSER.INST_BSC B ON A.WPMP_INST_MGNO = B.INST_MGNO INNER JOIN IRSUSER.IRB_DTL C ON A.BIZ_MNG_NO = C.BIZ_MNG_NO AND A.BIZ_DGR = C.BIZ_DGR WHERE 1=1 AND A.BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND A.BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) ORDER BY A.SN ASC

SELECT B.BIZ_MNG_NO ,B.BIZ_DGR ,B.DGR_REG_RSN_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('BIZ_GBN_CD', B.DGR_REG_RSN_CD) AS DGR_REG_RSN_CD_NM ,B.AGREE_MGNO ,( SELECT CNCLD_KRN_NM FROM IRSUSER.AGREE_STIPL_BSC WHERE CNCLD_MGNO = B.AGREE_MGNO AND CNCLD_DGR = B.AGREE_DGR ) AS AGREE_MGNO_NM ,B.AGREE_DGR ,B.INST_MGNO ,B.USER_ID ,B.PRGRM_MNG_NO ,B.BPLC_NM ,B.BIZ_ENFC_PLC_NM ,B.IATA_NTN_CD ,(SELECT NTN_KORN_NM FROM IRSUSER.COM_NTN_CD_BSC WHERE IATA_NTN_CD = B.IATA_NTN_CD) AS IATA_NTN_CD_NM ,B.APLY_CL_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('APLY_CL_CD', B.APLY_CL_CD) AS APLY_CL_CD_NM ,B.AGREE_CLAUS_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('AGREE_CLAUS_CD', B.AGREE_CLAUS_CD) AS AGREE_CLAUS_CD_NM ,B.BIZ_FORM_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('BIZ_FORM_CD', B.BIZ_FORM_CD) AS BIZ_FORM_CD_NM ,B.BIZ_TYPE_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('BIZ_TYPE_CD', B.BIZ_TYPE_CD) AS BIZ_TYPE_CD_NM ,B.BIZ_SCAL_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('BIZ_SCAL_CD', B.BIZ_SCAL_CD) AS BIZ_SCAL_CD_NM ,B.BIZ_ORGT_NM ,B.BIZ_KRN_NM ,B.KOFF_PRNMNT_YMD ,CAST(CAST(B.KOFF_PRNMNT_YMD AS DATE) AS TEXT) AS KOFF_PRNMNT_YMD_NM ,B.CERT_VLD_TYPE_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('CERT_VLD_TYPE_CD', B.CERT_VLD_TYPE_CD) AS CERT_VLD_TYPE_CD_NM ,B.CERT_VLD_BGNG_YMD ,B.CERT_VLD_END_YMD ,CAST(CAST(B.CERT_VLD_BGNG_YMD AS DATE) AS TEXT) || ' ~ ' || CAST(CAST(B.CERT_VLD_END_YMD AS DATE) AS TEXT) AS CERT_VLD_YMD ,COALESCE(B.BFCNVR_RDCQTY, 0) AS BFCNVR_RDCQTY ,B.RDC_UNIT_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('RDC_UNIT_CD', B.RDC_UNIT_CD) AS BFCNVR_RDCQTY_NM ,B.CNVR_COEF_CN ,B.CNVR_BASS_CN ,COALESCE(B.ATCNVR_RDCQTY, 0) AS ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('RDC_UNIT_CD', 'RUC0001') AS ATCNVR_RDCQTY_NM ,B.BIZ_FLD_CD ,B.BIZ_DTLS_FLD_CD ,( SELECT BIZ_FLD_KORN_NM FROM IRSUSER.COM_BIZ_FLD_BSC WHERE BIZ_FLD_CD_MGNO = B.BIZ_FLD_CD ) AS BIZ_FLD_CD_NM ,( SELECT BIZ_DTLS_FLD_KORN_NM FROM IRSUSER.COM_BIZ_FLD_DTL WHERE BIZ_FLD_CD_MGNO = B.BIZ_FLD_CD AND BIZ_FLD_DTLS_CD_MGNO = B.BIZ_DTLS_FLD_CD ) AS BIZ_FLD_CD_NM ,( SELECT BIZ_FLD_KORN_NM FROM IRSUSER.COM_BIZ_FLD_BSC WHERE BIZ_FLD_CD_MGNO = B.BIZ_FLD_CD ) || ' > ' || ( SELECT BIZ_DTLS_FLD_KORN_NM FROM IRSUSER.COM_BIZ_FLD_DTL WHERE BIZ_FLD_CD_MGNO = B.BIZ_FLD_CD AND BIZ_FLD_DTLS_CD_MGNO = B.BIZ_DTLS_FLD_CD ) AS BIZ_FLD_CD_SNM ,COALESCE(B.SOP_RDCQTY, 0) AS SOP_RDCQTY ,B.SOP_UNIT_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('SOP_UNIT_CD', B.SOP_UNIT_CD) AS SOP_UNIT_CD_NM ,COALESCE(B.OMGE_RDCQTY, 0) AS OMGE_RDCQTY ,B.OMGE_UNIT_CD ,IRSUSER.FN_GET_CODENM('OMGE_UNIT_CD', B.OMGE_UNIT_CD) AS OMGE_UNIT_CD_NM ,B.BIZ_PLND_FLMNO ,B.ETC_DATA_FLMNO ,B.CNVR_BASS_DATA_FLMNO ,B.TRSM_YN ,CASE WHEN B.TRSM_YN = 'Y' THEN '동의' ELSE '미동의' END AS TRSM_YN_NM ,B.CMPTNC_INST_MNG_NO ,B.APLY_TYPE_CD ,B.APLY_YMD ,B.PRCS_TYPE_CD ,B.PRCS_YMD ,B.ADD_DATA_TYPE_CD ,B.ADD_DATA_PRCS_YMD ,B.EVL_SN ,B.DIC_DLBR_SN ,B.DLBR_SN ,B.DLAY_SN ,B.RTRCN_SN ,B.DEL_YN ,A.BIZ_UNQNO ,A.BIZ_CHG_PSBLTY_YN ,A.CERT_PRD_UPDT_PSBLTY_YN ,A.CERT_BGNG_YMD_CHG_PSBLTY_YN ,A.RTADTI_SCSN_PSBLTY_YN ,A.ADD_DATA_DMND_PSBLTY_YN ,A.DLAY_DCLR_DMND_PSBLTY_YN ,A.BIZ_RTRCN_DMND_PSBLTY_YN ,A.KOFF_DCLR_PSBLTY_YN ,A.BIZ_KOFF_DGR ,B.REDD_PLUS_YN ,B.CHG_CN ,( SELECT '(변경전 : ' || CAST(CAST(T2.CERT_VLD_BGNG_YMD AS DATE) AS TEXT) || ' ~ ' || CAST(CAST(T2.CERT_VLD_END_YMD AS DATE) AS TEXT) || ' )' FROM IRSUSER.IRB_BSC T1 INNER JOIN IRSUSER.IRB_DTL T2 ON T1.BIZ_MNG_NO = T2.BIZ_MNG_NO AND T2.BIZ_DGR = ( SELECT MAX(BIZ_DGR) FROM IRSUSER.IRB_DTL WHERE BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR < CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) AND PRCS_TYPE_CD IN ('PTC0018', 'PTC0029', 'PTC0031', 'PTC0032', 'PTC0026') ) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} ) AS OLD_CERT_VLD_YMD ,B.SCSN_GBN_CD ,B.SCSN_CN ,B.SCSN_DATA_FLMNO ,B.SCSN_BIZ_PLND_FLMNO ,B.SCSN_ETC_DATA_FLMNO ,CAST(B.SCSN_BGNG_DGR AS TEXT) AS SCSN_BGNG_DGR FROM IRSUSER.IRB_BSC A INNER JOIN IRSUSER.IRB_DTL B ON A.BIZ_MNG_NO = B.BIZ_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND B.BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC)
mapper.update: UPDATE IRSUSER.IRB_BSC SET TYPE_CD = NULL ,DATA_DGR = NULL ,PRCS_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) ,VLD_BIZ_DGR = VLD_BIZ_DGR ,BIZ_KOFF_DGR = BIZ_KOFF_DGR ,BIZ_KOFF_YMD = BIZ_KOFF_YMD ,KOFF_RPT_FLMNO = KOFF_RPT_FLMNO ,BIZ_KOFF_YN = BIZ_KOFF_YN ,BIZ_UNQNO = BIZ_UNQNO ,BIZ_RTRCN_YN = BIZ_RTRCN_YN ,BIZ_RTRCN_YMD = BIZ_RTRCN_YMD ,BIZ_CHG_PSBLTY_YN = 'N' ,CERT_PRD_UPDT_PSBLTY_YN = 'N' ,CERT_BGNG_YMD_CHG_PSBLTY_YN = 'N' ,RTADTI_SCSN_PSBLTY_YN = 'N' ,ADD_DATA_DMND_PSBLTY_YN = 'N' ,DLAY_DCLR_DMND_PSBLTY_YN = 'N' ,BIZ_RTRCN_DMND_PSBLTY_YN = 'N' ,KOFF_DCLR_PSBLTY_YN = 'N' ,BIZ_RLS_YN = BIZ_RLS_YN ,MDFR_ID = #{auth.sUserId} ,MDFCN_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,SCSN_TYPE_CD = #{dgrRegRsnCd} ,SCSN_DATA_DGR = CASE WHEN COALESCE(SCSN_DATA_DGR, 0) < 1 THEN 1 ELSE SCSN_DATA_DGR+1 END ,SCSN_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo}

UPDATE IRSUSER.IRB_BSC SET PRCS_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) ,VLD_BIZ_DGR = VLD_BIZ_DGR ,BIZ_KOFF_DGR = BIZ_KOFF_DGR ,BIZ_KOFF_YMD = BIZ_KOFF_YMD ,KOFF_RPT_FLMNO = KOFF_RPT_FLMNO ,BIZ_KOFF_YN = BIZ_KOFF_YN ,BIZ_UNQNO = BIZ_UNQNO ,BIZ_RTRCN_YN = BIZ_RTRCN_YN ,BIZ_RTRCN_YMD = BIZ_RTRCN_YMD ,BIZ_CHG_PSBLTY_YN = BIZ_CHG_PSBLTY_YN ,CERT_PRD_UPDT_PSBLTY_YN = CERT_PRD_UPDT_PSBLTY_YN ,CERT_BGNG_YMD_CHG_PSBLTY_YN = CERT_BGNG_YMD_CHG_PSBLTY_YN ,RTADTI_SCSN_PSBLTY_YN = RTADTI_SCSN_PSBLTY_YN ,ADD_DATA_DMND_PSBLTY_YN = ADD_DATA_DMND_PSBLTY_YN ,DLAY_DCLR_DMND_PSBLTY_YN = DLAY_DCLR_DMND_PSBLTY_YN ,BIZ_RTRCN_DMND_PSBLTY_YN = BIZ_RTRCN_DMND_PSBLTY_YN ,KOFF_DCLR_PSBLTY_YN = KOFF_DCLR_PSBLTY_YN ,BIZ_RLS_YN = BIZ_RLS_YN ,MDFR_ID = #{auth.sUserId} ,MDFCN_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,SCSN_TYPE_CD = #{dgrRegRsnCd} ,SCSN_DATA_DGR = SCSN_DATA_DGR ,SCSN_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IRSUSER.IRB_PRGRM_DTL ( BIZ_MNG_NO ,BIZ_DGR ,AGREE_MGNO ,AGREE_DGR ,INST_MGNO ,USER_ID ,BPLC_NM ,BIZ_ENFC_PLC_NM ,AGREE_CLAUS_CD ,BIZ_ORGT_NM ,BIZ_KRN_NM ,CERT_VLD_BGNG_YMD ,CERT_VLD_END_YMD ,BIZ_FLD_CD ,BIZ_DTLS_FLD_CD ,BIZ_PLND_FLMNO ,ETC_DATA_FLMNO ,CNVR_BASS_DATA_FLMNO ,DEL_YN ,RGTR_ID ,REG_DT ,REDD_PLUS_YN ) SELECT BIZ_MNG_NO ,CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) BIZ_DGR ,AGREE_MGNO ,AGREE_DGR ,#{auth.sInstMgno} AS INST_MGNO ,#{auth.sUserId} AS USER_ID ,BPLC_NM ,BIZ_ENFC_PLC_NM ,AGREE_CLAUS_CD ,BIZ_ORGT_NM ,BIZ_KRN_NM ,CERT_VLD_BGNG_YMD ,CERT_VLD_END_YMD ,BIZ_FLD_CD ,BIZ_DTLS_FLD_CD ,BIZ_PLND_FLMNO ,ETC_DATA_FLMNO ,CNVR_BASS_DATA_FLMNO ,'N' AS DEL_YN ,#{auth.sUserId} AS RGTR_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REG_DT ,REDD_PLUS_YN FROM IRSUSER.IRB_PRGRM_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bfBizDgr} AS NUMERIC)

INSERT INTO IRSUSER.IRB_PRGRM_NTN_DTL ( BIZ_MNG_NO ,BIZ_DGR ,SN ,IATA_NTN_CD ,INST_NM ,DEPT_NM ,DEL_YN ,RGTR_ID ,REG_DT ) SELECT BIZ_MNG_NO ,CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) BIZ_DGR ,SN ,IATA_NTN_CD ,INST_NM ,DEPT_NM ,DEL_YN ,#{auth.sUserId} AS RGTR_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REG_DT FROM IRSUSER.IRB_PRGRM_NTN_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bfBizDgr} AS NUMERIC)

INSERT INTO IRSUSER.IRB_PRGRM_MHDLG_DTL ( BIZ_MNG_NO ,BIZ_DGR ,MHDLG_MGNO ,DEL_YN ,RGTR_ID ,REG_DT ) SELECT BIZ_MNG_NO ,CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) BIZ_DGR ,MHDLG_MGNO ,DEL_YN ,#{auth.sUserId} AS RGTR_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REG_DT FROM IRSUSER.IRB_PRGRM_MHDLG_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bfBizDgr} AS NUMERIC)

INSERT INTO IRSUSER.IRB_DTL ( BIZ_MNG_NO ,BIZ_DGR ,DGR_REG_RSN_CD ,AGREE_MGNO ,AGREE_DGR ,INST_MGNO ,USER_ID ,PRGRM_MNG_NO ,BPLC_NM ,BIZ_ENFC_PLC_NM ,IATA_NTN_CD ,APLY_CL_CD ,AGREE_CLAUS_CD ,BIZ_FORM_CD ,BIZ_TYPE_CD ,BIZ_SCAL_CD ,BIZ_ORGT_NM ,BIZ_KRN_NM ,KOFF_PRNMNT_YMD ,CERT_VLD_TYPE_CD ,CERT_VLD_BGNG_YMD ,CERT_VLD_END_YMD ,BFCNVR_RDCQTY ,RDC_UNIT_CD ,CNVR_COEF_CN ,CNVR_BASS_CN ,ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,BIZ_FLD_CD ,BIZ_DTLS_FLD_CD ,SOP_RDCQTY ,SOP_UNIT_CD ,OMGE_RDCQTY ,OMGE_UNIT_CD ,BIZ_PLND_FLMNO ,ETC_DATA_FLMNO ,CNVR_BASS_DATA_FLMNO ,TRSM_YN ,CMPTNC_INST_MNG_NO ,APLY_TYPE_CD ,APLY_YMD ,PRCS_TYPE_CD ,PRCS_YMD ,ADD_DATA_TYPE_CD ,ADD_DATA_PRCS_YMD ,EVL_SN ,DIC_DLBR_SN ,DLBR_SN ,DLAY_SN ,RTRCN_SN ,DEL_YN ,RGTR_ID ,REG_DT ,TYPE_CD ,DATA_DGR ,REDD_PLUS_YN ,CHG_CN ,SCSN_GBN_CD ,SCSN_CN ,SCSN_DATA_FLMNO ,SCSN_BIZ_PLND_FLMNO ,SCSN_ETC_DATA_FLMNO ,SCSN_BGNG_DGR ) SELECT BIZ_MNG_NO ,CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) AS BIZ_DGR ,#{dgrRegRsnCd} AS DGR_REG_RSN_CD ,AGREE_MGNO ,AGREE_DGR ,#{auth.sInstMgno} AS INST_MGNO ,#{auth.sUserId} AS USER_ID ,PRGRM_MNG_NO ,BPLC_NM ,BIZ_ENFC_PLC_NM ,IATA_NTN_CD ,#{aplyClCd} AS APLY_CL_CD ,AGREE_CLAUS_CD ,BIZ_FORM_CD ,BIZ_TYPE_CD ,BIZ_SCAL_CD ,BIZ_ORGT_NM ,BIZ_KRN_NM ,KOFF_PRNMNT_YMD ,CERT_VLD_TYPE_CD ,CERT_VLD_BGNG_YMD ,CERT_VLD_END_YMD ,BFCNVR_RDCQTY ,RDC_UNIT_CD ,CNVR_COEF_CN ,CNVR_BASS_CN ,ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,BIZ_FLD_CD ,BIZ_DTLS_FLD_CD ,SOP_RDCQTY ,SOP_UNIT_CD ,OMGE_RDCQTY ,OMGE_UNIT_CD ,BIZ_PLND_FLMNO ,ETC_DATA_FLMNO ,CNVR_BASS_DATA_FLMNO ,#{trsmYn} AS TRSM_YN ,CMPTNC_INST_MNG_NO ,#{aplyTypeCd} AS APLY_TYPE_CD ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS APLY_YMD ,#{prcsTypeCd} AS PRCS_TYPE_CD ,NULL AS PRCS_YMD ,NULL AS ADD_DATA_TYPE_CD ,NULL AS ADD_DATA_PRCS_YMD ,CAST(#{evlSn} AS NUMERIC) AS EVL_SN ,CAST(#{dicDlbrSn} AS NUMERIC) AS DIC_DLBR_SN ,#{dlbrSn} AS DLBR_SN ,#{dlaySn} AS DLAY_SN ,#{rtrcnSn} AS RTRCN_SN ,'N' AS DEL_YN ,#{auth.sUserId} AS RGTR_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REG_DT ,NULL AS TYPE_CD ,0 AS DATA_DGR ,REDD_PLUS_YN ,NULL AS CHG_CN ,#{scsnGbnCd} AS SCSN_GBN_CD ,#{scsnCn} AS SCSN_CN ,#{scsnDataFlmno} AS SCSN_DATA_FLMNO ,#{scsnBizPlndFlmno} AS SCSN_BIZ_PLND_FLMNO ,#{scsnEtcDataFlmno} AS SCSN_ETC_DATA_FLMNO ,CAST(#{scsnBgngDgr} AS NUMERIC) AS SCSN_BGNG_DGR FROM IRSUSER.IRB_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bfBizDgr} AS NUMERIC)

INSERT INTO IRSUSER.IRB_NTN_DTL ( BIZ_MNG_NO ,BIZ_DGR ,SN ,IATA_NTN_CD ,INST_NM ,DEPT_NM ,DEL_YN ,RGTR_ID ,REG_DT ) SELECT BIZ_MNG_NO ,CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) AS BIZ_DGR ,SN ,IATA_NTN_CD ,INST_NM ,DEPT_NM ,DEL_YN ,#{auth.sUserId} AS RGTR_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REG_DT FROM IRSUSER.IRB_NTN_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bfBizDgr} AS NUMERIC)

INSERT INTO IRSUSER.IRB_MHDLG_DTL ( BIZ_MNG_NO ,BIZ_DGR ,MHDLG_MGNO ,DEL_YN ,RGTR_ID ,REG_DT ) SELECT BIZ_MNG_NO ,CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) AS BIZ_DGR ,MHDLG_MGNO ,DEL_YN ,#{auth.sUserId} AS RGTR_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REG_DT FROM IRSUSER.IRB_MHDLG_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bfBizDgr} AS NUMERIC)

INSERT INTO IRSUSER.IRB_EXCR_DTL ( BIZ_MNG_NO ,BIZ_DGR ,SN ,INST_MGNO ,DMST_CL_CD ,BFCNVR_RDCQTY ,RDC_UNIT_CD ,CNVR_COEF_CN ,CNVR_BASS_CN ,ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,AGRE_YN ,AGRE_YMD ,INST_AGRE_YN ,INST_AGRE_YMD ,DEL_YN ,RGTR_ID ,REG_DT ,BZENT_NM ) SELECT BIZ_MNG_NO ,CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) AS BIZ_DGR ,SN ,INST_MGNO ,DMST_CL_CD ,BFCNVR_RDCQTY ,RDC_UNIT_CD ,CNVR_COEF_CN ,CNVR_BASS_CN ,ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,AGRE_YN ,AGRE_YMD ,INST_AGRE_YN ,INST_AGRE_YMD ,DEL_YN ,#{auth.sUserId} AS RGTR_ID ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REG_DT ,BZENT_NM FROM IRSUSER.IRB_EXCR_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bfBizDgr} AS NUMERIC)

INSERT INTO IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL ( BIZ_MNG_NO ,BIZ_DGR ,SN ,HNOV_INST_MGNO ,HNOV_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,HNOV_BLCK_MGNO ,HNOV_QTY ,WPMP_INST_MGNO ,WPMP_ATCNVR_RDCQTY ,WPMP_BLCK_MGNO ,WPMP_QTY ,AGRE_YN ,AGRE_YMD ,INST_AGRE_YN ,INST_AGRE_YMD ,DEL_YN ,RGTR_ID ,REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{bizMngNo} ,CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) ,(SELECT COALESCE(MAX(SN), 0) + 1 FROM IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL WHERE BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC)) ,#{hnovInstMgno} ,CAST(#{hnovAtcnvrRdcqty} AS NUMERIC) ,#{hnovBlckMgno} ,#{hnovQty} ,#{wpmpInstMgno} ,CAST(#{wpmpAtcnvrRdcqty} AS NUMERIC) ,#{wpmpBlckMgno} ,#{wpmpQty} ,'N' ,NULL ,'N' ,NULL ,'N' ,#{auth.sUserId} ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC) AND AGRE_YN != 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_MNG_NO = A.BIZ_MNG_NO AND BIZ_DGR = A.BIZ_DGR AND AGRE_YN = 'Y' ) AS AGRE_CNT FROM IRSUSER.IRB_SCSN_EXCR_DTL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BIZ_MNG_NO = #{bizMngNo} AND A.BIZ_DGR = CAST(#{bizDgr} AS NUMERIC)
